author: ryanleeschneider
content: What about running a handful of "full" CLs that are explicitly trusted by your light clients, would that allow the light client to stay on the current slot?  We'd be very interested in a topology where we run a handful of full CL/EL pairs that then drive consensus for the rest of our fleet (running EL and a light CL), _especially_ if doing so would help ensure a more consistent view of the network across the EL fleet.
